name: Wrath of the Titans
summary: A complete 9-level episode featuring some new textures and classic Heretic style with attention to Raven's mapping conventions. The set plays on the episode 2 slot. It includes 8 revised editions of ETTiNGRiNDER's prior released ﻿maps to update the visuals and gameplay, plus 1 never before released one (E2M2)
